title: Flagellant
name: Damien
description: A zealous devotee who finds power and religious ecstasy through self-inflicted pain. Once a vagrant, Damien discovered his calling after a violent encounter, leading him to dedicate his life to suffering as a form of worship and atonement.
history: Formerly a destitute wanderer in the city, Damien's life changed when he was attacked by drunks. The pain awakened a fervent religious conviction within him, leading him to join the clergy and later seek out suffering as a form of spiritual enlightenment.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Pronounced lips and chin, scars on his back

notes: Speaks in a mix of improvised religious doctrine and fragments of actual scripture
Views his scarred flesh as 'The Testament' - a living document of his devotion to the Light
Refers to his flail as 'The Burden'
Becomes more powerful the closer he is to death
